titleStmt.title: An humble petition for accomodation presented to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, at Oxford, on Sunday the eleventh of this instant December / from the gentry and commonalty of the countie of Yorke, and other adjoying counties; declaring their earnest desire to have peace concluded, and a happy agreement, betweene the King and Parliament.

An humble petition for accomodation presented to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, at Oxford, on Sunday the eleventh of this instant December / from the gentry and commonalty of the countie of Yorke, and other adjoying counties; declaring their earnest desire to have peace concluded, and a happy agreement, betweene the King and Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
